channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [PIG-4053] TestMRCompiler succeeded with sun jdk 1.6 while failed with sun jdk 1.7
item.description:
TestMRCompiler succeeded with sun jdk 1.6.0_45 while failed with sun jdk 1.7.0_60 with following error message:
Testcase: testMergeJoin took 0.193 sec
FAILED
expected:<....PigStorage','eNqtVT[]=','','','scope','tr...> but was:<....PigStorage','eNqtVT[]=','','','scope','tr...>
junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: expected:<....PigStorage','eNqtVT[]=','','','scope','tr...> but was:<....PigStorage','eNqtVT[]=','','','scope','tr...>
at org.apache.pig.test.TestMRCompiler.run(TestMRCompiler.java:1148)
at org.apache.pig.test.TestMRCompiler.testMergeJoin(TestMRCompiler.java:1014)
item.summary: TestMRCompiler succeeded with sun jdk 1.6 while failed with sun jdk 1.7

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: In general, TestMRCompiler.testMergeJoin is a constant trouble maker. I would like to rewrite it.

+1.

org.junit.Assume.assumeFalse("Skip this test for hadoop 0.20.2. See PIG-3194", VersionInfo.getVersion().equals("0.20.2"));

With your new test, this line can be removed, right? Can you delete it?

Yes, this line should be removed.

Patch plus removing the line committed to trunk. Thanks Cheolsoo for review!
